reviewText: The best of the 3 in my opinion is Green Card.  Mumford was pretty good too.  Hope Springs was missing that little something, but it was ok.  For the price I paid, it was well worth the purchase.  Not at all disappointed in this purchase.dlp

reviewText: Im giving this DVD 5 stars just for  Green Card  !  I bought this specifically for this movie . It's been around awhile, but it is such a sweet  & warm story ! Do opposites attract ? Yes ! Can love come under crazy circumstances ? Yes !  You'll love this quirky romance !  Looking forward to watching the other 2  movies soon .  But , even if they are bad , I'll still be happy to have Green Card !

reviewText: I bought this because I really wanted to see Green Card again. It is one my very favorite quirky romances. This came with 2 other films I'd never seen at a great price-less than Green Card alone, so I got a movie I love plus to bonus films. Hope Springs and Mumford were cute and quirky, though not as good as Green Card, but well worth watching. This is a great triple feature for a girls or sister's weekend!

reviewText: And discovered Mumford - a lovely human drama with beautiful performances. Hope Springs is forgetable. Green Card has been a favorite of mine since it came out so it's nice not to have to drag out the VCR in order to watch it.
